short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a list of all the noisy tabs in chrome and mute with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This handy pop-up shows you a list of all the noisy and audible tabs in your browser and you can mute or unmute them with a simple click.

No more struggling to locate that annoying tab that is blasting music! 

Especially useful if you have a hundred tabs open at a time (like me) and have no idea where the audible tab is!

When the extension icon is clicked, a pop-up shows you a bulleted list of all the audible tabs in your chrome browser with a sound icon that indicates whether it is muted or unmuted.
